    • Constructor Detail

      • CharacterMenu

        public CharacterMenu(GameScreen gameScreen,
             com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage,
             ClientConnection connection)
        This creates the screen. It consiststs of a number of buttons superimposed onto a chatacter image. Each button represents a different item on the character.
        Parameters:
        gameScreen - - The screen to render the window on.
        stage - - The stage in which the window is held.

      • getBestButtonSize

        public float getBestButtonSize(float visableWidth,
                      float visibleHeight,
                      int numberAcross,
                      int numberHeight)
        Calculate the optimal size for each button depending on the screen size.
        Parameters:
        visableWidth - - The bounds on which buttons can be rendered (width)
        visibleHeight - - The bounds on which buttons can be rendered (height)
        numberAcross - - The number of buttons placed side by side on the width
        numberHeight - - The number of buttons stacked on top of each other
        Returns:
        - int - The optimal square size for the buttons to be.
